title: The Glowing Grove
trigger_condition: Player enters a forest biome at night
description: You stumble upon a small grove where the trees and undergrowth emit a soft, pulsating blue glow. The air hums with strange energy, and you notice unusual mushrooms growing in patterns around a central, crystalline formation.

choices.consequence: Gain 3 Bioluminescent Mushrooms (crafting component), but suffer -10 Radiation for 2 hours
Discover a hidden cache with Rare components, but trigger a trap that deals 15 damage

choices.option: Mark the location and leave quietly
choices.consequence: Gain +5 Perception for discovering a hidden location, no immediate rewards
Gain 50 XP and clear radiation in area, but anger local mutated creatures who will hunt you for 24 hours

duration: 24 hours (location remains until destroyed or harvested)
